Thank you for putting HPE values into action! Please click green box above to read the full message. A copy of this recognition was sent to your manager.

${programName}, a MyRecognition @hpe program, provides a way for managers to recognize employees for significant accomplishments with HPE points. You can use your points immediately or save for bigger prizes. HPE points can be redeemed for merchandise, gift cards, charity donations, experiences, or travel. Redemption options vary by country.
